project_short_description: Python CLI app based on Hatch

__prompts__.__project_slug: Provide the [bold yellow]project slug[/] (only ASCII letters/digits, underscores, hyphens, and periods)
__prompts__.pkg_name: Provide the [bold yellow]package name[/] (only ASCII letters/digits, and underscores)
__prompts__.cli_command_name: Provide [bold yellow]CLI command name of utility[/] (usually sequence of 3-5 letters, can include dot and dash)
__prompts__.open_source_license: Provide the [bold yellow]license[/] of this project
__prompts__.github_username: Optionally, provide a [bold yellow]Github user name[/]
__prompts__.pypi_username: Optionally, provide a [bold yellow]PyPI user name[/]
